verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the fig and the olive.
verse.verse_4: We created man in the best design.
verse.verse_5: Then reduced him to the lowest of the low.
verse.verse_6: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds; for them is a reward without end.
verse.verse_7: So why do you still reject the religion?
verse.verse_8: Is God not the Wisest of the wise?
